text: Ya koi aur aisi khulqat jo tumharay dilon mein boht hi sakht maloom ho phir woh yeh poochen kay kaun hai jo doobara humari zindagi lotaye? Aap jawab dey den kay wohi Allah jiss ney tumhen awal martaba peda kiya iss per woh apney sir hila hila ker aap say daryaft keren gay kay acha yeh hai kab? To aap jawab dey den kay kiya ajab kay woh (saâ€™at) qareeb hi aan lagi ho
